1370: Lubertus moved to Bloemendaelse straet.B.8 after marriage.
Got married to Myrthel at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Myrthel, Hetselo, at age 29.
1371: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Ghodelde, at age 30.
1375: Had a son with Myrthel, Hughe, at age 34.
1376: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Gerburgis, at age 35.
1377: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Ghela, at age 36.
1378: Had a son with Myrthel, Cats, at age 37.
1379: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Gloria, at age 38.
1382: Had a son with Myrthel, Abelkijn, at age 41.
1383: Had a son with Myrthel, Lutgeri, at age 42.
1385: Lost son Hetselo when Hetselo was 16 years old.
